blogPost.excerpt: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
blogPost.body: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
blogPost.title: Browser Stealth Mode - Disguise your internet browsing activities
blogPost.author: Nivi Jayasekar

localize.description: 浏览器隐身模式是一个chrome扩展，让你浏览和观看任何东西，而不用担心谁在看你的肩膀。你可以在当前标签中切换隐身模式。隐身模式包括灰度、隐藏图片/视频和静音标签。
localize.tagline: 掩饰您的互联网浏览活动

localize.description: 瀏覽器隱身模式是一個chrome擴展，讓你瀏覽和觀看任何東西，而不用擔心誰在看你的肩膀。你可以在當前標籤中切換隱身模式。隱身模式包括灰度、隱藏圖片/視頻和靜音標籤。
localize.tagline: 掩飾您的互聯網瀏覽活動

previous.excerpt: Based on Codeforces, Game of Codes is all about competitive programming, be it practicing, analyzing, learning, or even doing contests with your friends! This is full in one package for Codeforces lovers, and have 2000+ users registered and growing.
previous.title: Game Of Codes - Level up your code

localize.description: 基于Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款关于竞技编程的游戏，无论是练习、分析、学习，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比赛都是如此! 这是为Codeforces爱好者提供的全套服务，目前已有2000+用户注册，并在不断增长。
基於Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款關於競技編程的遊戲，無論是練習、分析、學習，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比賽都是如此! 這是爲Codeforces愛好者提供的全套服務，目前已有2000+用戶註冊，並在不斷增長。

next.excerpt: At BAM, we created a set of most-used icons in 3D. Now we'd like to put our illustrations into your dispositions, you can use them for any use, our only condition is that you can't resell them as your creation and you keep our name in your credit :) Enjoy!
next.title: BAM Free 3D Illustration Kit - More than 30 high quality 3D icons, free to use.

localize.description: 在BAM，我们创建了一套3D中最常用的图标。现在，我们想把我们的插图放到您的手中，您可以将它们用于任何用途，我们唯一的条件是您不能将它们作为您的作品转售，并且您要将我们的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多个高质量的3D图标，免费使用。

localize.description: 在BAM，我們創建了一套3D中最常用的圖標。現在，我們想把我們的插圖放到您的手中，您可以將它們用於任何用途，我們唯一的條件是您不能將它們作爲您的作品轉售，並且您要將我們的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多個高質量的3D圖標，免費使用。
